OEC Review Slides

This resouce is designed as a general study aide to prepare for the National Ski Patrol Outdoor Emergency Care Certification test. It is not affiliated with any official NSP publications and is not endorsed by NSP. The materials here cannot substitute for the OEC 5th Edition text and are not intended to act as a replacement to the text.
